projects.title: Docwo - Clinic Booking Appointment App
projects.overview: Full-stack clinic booking system built with React + Vite frontend, Node.js backend, PostgreSQL database, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, and Next.js. Features a real-time token system for managing appointments.
keyFeatures: Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and Material UI

challengesSolutions.challenge: Implementing a real-time token system for appointments
challengesSolutions.solution: Used WebSocket and Node.js backend for live token updates

challengesSolutions.challenge: Managing complex state and server-side data
challengesSolutions.solution: Used React Query and optimized PostgreSQL queries

projects.title: Sole Savvy
projects.overview: Full-stack shoe-selling e-commerce app allowing users to browse, filter, and purchase shoes. The platform supports secure authentication, product listing, and order management for a smooth shopping experience.
keyFeatures: Product listing with filters and categories
Admin dashboard for managing products and orders
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
Image upload and preview for products

challengesSolutions.challenge: Managing user authentication and session securely
challengesSolutions.solution: Implemented JWT-based authentication with secure storage
Optimized MongoDB queries and used indexing for faster search
Integrated Firebase storage for image hosting and retrieval
Used React state management with optimized component rendering
